trans-unit.source: .NET Architectural Components
trans-unit.target: .NET 架構元件

trans-unit.source: Describes key .NET architectural components such as the .NET Standard Library, .NET runtimes, and tooling.
trans-unit.target: 說明主要的 .NET 架構元件，例如，.NET 標準程式庫、.NET 執行階段和工具。

trans-unit.source: .NET, .NET Standard Library, .NET Standard, .NET Core, .NET Framework, Xamarin, MSBuild, C#, F#, VB, compilers
trans-unit.target: .NET, .NET 標準程式庫, .NET 標準, .NET Core, .NET Framework, Xamarin, MSBuild, C#, F#, VB, 編譯器

trans-unit.source: .NET Architectural Components
trans-unit.target: .NET 架構元件

trans-unit.source: .NET is made up of a number of key components.
trans-unit.target: .NET 是由數個主要元件所組成。

trans-unit.source: It has a standard library, called the .NET Standard Library, which is a large set of APIs which runs everywhere.
trans-unit.target: 它具有名為 .NET 標準程式庫的標準程式庫，這是可在任何地方執行的大型 API 集合。

trans-unit.source: This standard library is implemented by three .NET runtimes - .NET Framework, .NET Core, and Mono for Xamarin.
trans-unit.target: 此標準程式庫是由三個 .NET 執行階段所實作 - .NET Framework、.NET Core，以及適用於 Xamarin 的 Mono。

trans-unit.source: The .NET languages also run on any .NET runtime.
trans-unit.target: .NET 語言也會在任何 .NET 執行階段執行。

trans-unit.source: Additionally, there are tools on every platform which allow you to build projects.
trans-unit.target: 此外，每個平台上均會提供工具，可讓您用以建置專案。

trans-unit.source: These tools are the same regardless of your choice of runtime.
trans-unit.target: 無論您選擇的是哪個執行階段，這些工具都一樣。

trans-unit.source: Here's a graphical overview of each of the previously mentioned components of .NET and how they fit.
trans-unit.target: 以下是先前提及的每個 .NET 元件的圖形化概觀，以及它們的相符方式。

trans-unit.source: All .NET Architectural Components Together
trans-unit.target: 將所有 .NET 架構元件放在一起

trans-unit.source: What follows is a brief explanation of each of the key components shown above.
trans-unit.target: 以下是針對上述每個主要元件的簡短說明。

trans-unit.source: .NET Standard Library
trans-unit.target: .NET 標準程式庫

trans-unit.source: The .NET Standard Library is a set of APIs which are implemented by a .NET runtime.
trans-unit.target: .NET 標準程式庫是一組由 .NET 執行階段所實作的 API。

trans-unit.source: More formally, it is a specification of .NET APIs which make up a uniform set of contracts that you compile your code against.
trans-unit.target: 更正式的說法是，它是一個 .NET API 的規格，其構成了一組您據以編譯程式碼的制式協定。

trans-unit.source: These contracts have underlying implementations for each .NET runtime.
trans-unit.target: 這些協定必須具有適用於每個 .NET 執行階段的基礎實作。

trans-unit.source: This enables portability across different .NET runtimes, making it so that your code can effectively "run everywhere".
trans-unit.target: 這會跨不同的 .NET 執行階段啟用可攜性，如此一來，您的程式碼便能有效地「在任何地方執行」。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Standard Library is also a build target, where it is known as the .NET Standard.
trans-unit.target: .NET 標準程式庫也是一個建置目標 (即為 .NET 標準)。

trans-unit.source: You can currently target .NET Standard 1.0-1.6.
trans-unit.target: 您目前可將目標設定為 .NET 標準 1.0-1.6。

trans-unit.source: If your code targets a version of the .NET Standard, it is guaranteed to run on any .NET runtime which implements that version.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的程式碼目標為某一個 .NET 標準版本，就保證其一定可在實作該版本的任何 .NET 執行階段上執行。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the .NET Standard library and targeting the .NET Standard, see [.NET Standard Library](library.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要深入了解 .NET 標準程式庫以及如何將目標設為 .NET 標準，請參閱 [.NET 標準程式庫](library.md)。

trans-unit.source: .NET runtimes
trans-unit.target: .NET 執行階段

trans-unit.source: There are 3 primary .NET runtimes which Microsoft actively develops and maintains: .NET Core, .NET Framework, and Mono for Xamarin.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft 會主動開發和維護的主要 .NET 執行階段有 3 個︰.NET Core、.NET Framework，以及適用於 Xamarin 的 Mono。

trans-unit.source: .NET Core
trans-unit.target: .NET Core

trans-unit.source: .NET Core is a cross-platform runtime optimized for server workloads.
trans-unit.target: .NET Core 是已針對伺服器工作負載最佳化的跨平台執行階段。

trans-unit.source: It implements the .NET Standard Library, which means that any code that targets the .NET Standard can run on .NET Core.
trans-unit.target: 它會實作 .NET 標準程式庫，這表示任何目標為 .NET 標準的程式碼都可以在 .NET Core 上執行。

trans-unit.source: It is the runtime used by ASP.NET Core and the Universal Windows Platform (UWP).
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET Core 和通用 Windows 平台 (UWP) 所使用的執行階段。

trans-unit.source: It is modern, efficient, and designed to handle server and cloud workloads at scale.
trans-unit.target: 它是新式且高效率的，而其設計目的是為了處理大規模的伺服器與雲端工作負載。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about .NET Core, see the [.NET Core Guide](../core/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要深入了解 .NET Core，請參閱 [.NET Core 指南](../core/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework is the historical .NET runtime that has existed since 2002.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 是自 2002年以來已存在的歷史性 .NET 執行階段。

trans-unit.source: It is the same .NET Framework existing .NET developers have always used.
trans-unit.target: 它就是現有 .NET 開發人員一律會使用的同一個 .NET Framework。

trans-unit.source: It implements the .NET Standard Library, which means that any code that targets the .NET Standard can run on the .NET Framework.
trans-unit.target: 它會實作 .NET 標準程式庫，這表示任何目標為 .NET 標準的程式碼都可以在 .NET Framework 上執行。

trans-unit.source: It contains additional Windows-specific APIs, such as APIs for Windows desktop development with Windows Forms and WPF.
trans-unit.target: 它包含其他 Windows 特定的 API，例如，使用 Windows Form 和 WPF 進行適用於 Windows 桌面開發的 API。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework is optimized for building Windows desktop applications.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 最適合用來建置 Windows 傳統型應用程式。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about the .NET Framework, see the [.NET Framework Guide](../framework/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 若要深入了解 .NET Framework，請參閱 [.NET Framework 指南](../framework/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: Mono for Xamarin
trans-unit.target: 適用於 Xamarin 的 Mono

trans-unit.source: Mono is the runtime used by Xamarin apps.
trans-unit.target: Mono 是 Xamarin 應用程式所使用的執行階段。

trans-unit.source: It implements the .NET Standard Library, which means that any code that targets the .NET Standard can run on Xamarin apps.
trans-unit.target: 它會實作 .NET 標準程式庫，這表示任何目標為 .NET 標準的程式碼都可以在 Xamarin 應用程式上執行。

trans-unit.source: It contains additional APIs for iOS, Android, Xamarin.Forms, and Xamarin.Mac.
trans-unit.target: 它包含適用於 iOS、Android、Xamarin.Forms 和 Xamarin.Mac 的其他 API。

trans-unit.source: It is optimized for building mobile applications on iOS and Android.
trans-unit.target: 它最適合用來在 iOS 和 Android 上建置行動應用程式。

trans-unit.source: To learn more about Mono, see the [Mono documentation](http://www.mono-project.com/docs/).
trans-unit.target: 若要深入了解 Mono，請參閱 [Mono 文件](http://www.mono-project.com/docs/)。

trans-unit.source: .NET tooling and common infrastructure
trans-unit.target: .NET 工具和通用基礎結構

trans-unit.source: Tooling for .NET is also common across each implementation of .NET.
trans-unit.target: 適用於 .NET 的工具在每個 .NET 實作中也很常見。

trans-unit.source: These include, but are not limited to:
trans-unit.target: 這些包括但不限於：

trans-unit.source: The .NET languages and their compilers
trans-unit.target: .NET 語言及其編譯器

trans-unit.source: Runtime components, such as the JIT and Garbage Collector
trans-unit.target: 執行階段元件，例如 JIT 和記憶體回收行程

trans-unit.source: .NET project system (sometimes known as "csproj", "vbproj", or "fsproj")
trans-unit.target: .NET 專案系統 (有時稱為 "csproj"、"vbproj" 或 "fsproj")

trans-unit.source: MSBuild, the build engine used to build projects
trans-unit.target: MSBuild，用來建置專案的建置引擎

trans-unit.source: NuGet, Microsoft's package manager for .NET
trans-unit.target: NuGet，適用於.NET 的 Microsoft 套件管理員

trans-unit.source: The .NET CLI, a cross-platform command-line interface for building .NET projects
trans-unit.target: .NET CLI，用來建置 .NET 專案的跨平台命令列介面

trans-unit.source: Open Source build orchestration tools, such as CAKE and FAKE
trans-unit.target: 開放原始碼建置協調流程工具，例如 CAKE 和 FAKE

trans-unit.source: The main takeaway here should be that there is a vast amount of tooling and infrastructure which is common for any "flavor" of .NET you choose to build your apps with.
trans-unit.target: 此處的主要重點應該是有大量的工具和基礎結構，其對於您選擇來建置應用程式的任何 .NET「類別」而言是很常見的。

trans-unit.source: Next Steps
trans-unit.target: 後續步驟

trans-unit.source: To learn more, visit the following:
trans-unit.target: 若要深入了解，請瀏覽下列各項：

trans-unit.source: [.NET Standard Library](library.md)
trans-unit.target: [.NET 標準程式庫](library.md)

trans-unit.target: [.NET Core 指南](../core/index.md)

trans-unit.target: [.NET Framework 指南](../framework/index.md)

trans-unit.target: [C# 指南](../csharp/index.md)

trans-unit.source: [F# Guide](../fsharp/index.md)
trans-unit.target: [F# 指南](../fsharp/index.md)

trans-unit.target: [VB.NET 指南](../visual-basic/index.md)
